INSERT INTO TRANSFER_MESSAGE( MESSAGE_NUMBER, VERSION, LAUNCH_TIME, MESSAGE_TYPE,
SENDER, RECEIVER,
TRANS_TYPE, TRANS_SN, RECEIVING_BANK_CODE,
ACCT_NUMBER, ACCT_BANK_CODE,
OPP_ACCT_NUMBER, OPP_ACCT_BANK_CODE,
AMOUNT, SUMMARY, VOUCHER_NUMBER )VALUES( #{messageNumber}, #{version}, #{launchTime}, #{messageType},
#{sender}, #{receiver},
#{transType}, #{transSN}, #{receivingBankCode},
#{account.number}, #{account.bankCode},
#{oppositeAccount.number}, #{oppositeAccount.bankCode},
#{amount}, #{summary}, #{voucherNumber} )
